author: cbs8
title: Darrell Summervilles New Book The Power Of A Womans Position is an Enlightening, In-Depth Work About the Power of Women
text:
Recent release “The Power Of A Woman’s Position” from Page Publishing author Darrell Summerville is both captivating and cultural; this work keeps mesmerized as it delves into the strengths and empowerment of women.
(PRWEB) October 23, 2015
Darrell Summerville, a researcher, women’s activist, devoted writer and author, has completed his new book “The Power Of A Woman’s Position”: a gripping and potent work about women’s cognitive and physical attributes.
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Darrell Summerville’s informative book forces the reader to realize women are powerful!
‘The Power Of A Woman’s Position’ refutes any notion that a woman must think like a man but act like a lady. This work reminds the female reader, as well as the male reader, that a woman is powerful just by being herself. As attention-grabbing as its title and cover in it design, this daring volume takes on subject such as a woman’s detailed thought process, what makes her happy, and a never before seen view of her sex.
Unyielding...Immovable...Empowerment...Respect...Power-Player...
This is The Power Of A Woman's Position.
Readers who wish to experience this profound work can purchase “The Power Of A Woman’s Position” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Page Publishing knows that authors need to be free to create - not bogged down with complicated business issues like eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, insurance, shipping, taxes and the like. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
